data.comment: Today's match is followed by 5460 spectators.
The match is underway at SchücoArena.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Bielefeld close to the penalty box.
Patrick Ittrich awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
In the minute 4, 1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 9, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bielefeld close to the penalty box.
Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
Fabian Klos (Bielefeld) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Bielefeld.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
In the minute 16, Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Bielefeld.
Patrick Ittrich waits before resuming play because Jonas Hector for 1. FC Cologne is still down.
1. FC Cologne's Jonas Hector has been booked in Bielefeld.
In the minute 18, Jonas Hector for 1. FC Cologne is back on the field again.
Manuel Prietl for Bielefeld gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can 1. FC Cologne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bielefeld's half?
Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 24, Patrick Ittrich signals a Bielefeld throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Patrick Ittrich awards the away team a throw-in.
In Bielefeld a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 27, 1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Bielefeld.
In the minute 29, Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bielefeld.
Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Patrick Ittrich signals a throw-in for 1. FC Cologne, close to Bielefeld's area.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
In Bielefeld 1. FC Cologne drive forward through Jonas Hector. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Bielefeld a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
Bielefeld drives forward and Anderson Lucoqui gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
In the minute 41, Bielefeld needs to be cautious. 1. FC Cologne have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for 1. FC Cologne in Bielefeld.
1. FC Cologne are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 42, Ellyes Skhiri gets his shot on target but fails to score for 1. FC Cologne.
Free kick Bielefeld.
At SchücoArena, Rafael Czichos has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
Patrick Ittrich blows against Bielefeld's Cebio Soukou for offside.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
1. FC Cologne's Ondrej Duda breaks free at SchücoArena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Fabian Klos is booked for the home team.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at SchücoArena.
In the minute 46, Markus Gisdol is making the team's first substitution at SchücoArena with Dominick Drexler replacing Jonas Hector.
In the minute 48, Patrick Ittrich awards the home team a throw-in.
Bielefeld pushes forward through Marcel Hartel, whose finish on goal is saved.
Patrick Ittrich awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
1. FC Cologne have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 52, 1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Bielefeld.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Patrick Ittrich awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
1. FC Cologne's Jan Thielmann is on target but unsuccessful.
Patrick Ittrich signals a Bielefeld throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
Elvis Rexhbecaj (1. FC Cologne) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 62, Dimitris Limnios is replacing Jan Thielmann for the away team.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bielefeld.
In the minute 63, In Bielefeld a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at SchücoArena.
Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Bielefeld to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Joan Edmundsson is replacing Sergio Cordova for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
1. FC Cologne's Sebastian Andersson misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
In the minute 70, 1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Patrick Ittrich awards the away team a throw-in.
Sven Schipplock is on a sub for Ritsu Doan for Bielefeld.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 76, 1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Markus Gisdol (1. FC Cologne) is making a third substitution, with Salih Ozcan replacing Ondrej Duda.
In the minute 76, 1. FC Cologne make their fourth substitution with Toluwalase Emmanuel Arokodare replacing Sebastian Andersson.
Bielefeld are pushing forward but Amos Pieper's finish is wide of the goal.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Bielefeld take a 1-0 lead thanks to Joan Edmundsson.
Stefan Ortega with an assist there.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
In the minute 81, Patrick Ittrich awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Patrick Ittrich signals a Bielefeld throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
The away team have replaced Elvis Rexhbecaj with Frederik Sorensen. This is the fifth substitution made today by Markus Gisdol.
In the minute 88, 1. FC Cologne are coming forward and Toluwalase Emmanuel Arokodare gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
The home team replace Marcel Hartel with Fabian Kunze.
In the minute 89, Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne.
Cebio Soukou (Bielefeld) gets a yellow card.
The match at SchücoArena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sven Schipplock, who is down injured.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Bielefeld.
Bielefeld's Sven Schipplock is back in action after a slight knock.
Patrick Ittrich awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
In Bielefeld a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at SchücoArena.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Sven Schipplock (Bielefeld) has received a first yellow card.
Frederik Sorensen (1. FC Cologne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
